movies.title: La Bataille de Varsovie
movies.plot: The First Polish 3D Feature Film! Poland's winning battle against Soviet Russia as seen through the eyes of two young protagonists, Ola and Jan. She is a Warsaw cabaret dancer, while he is a cavalry officer and poet who believes in socialist ideals.
movies.simplePlot: The First Polish 3D Feature Film! Poland's winning battle against Soviet Russia as seen through the eyes of two young protagonists, Ola and Jan. She is a Warsaw cabaret dancer, while he is ...

biography.bio: Daniel Olbrychski was born on February 27, 1945 in Lowicz, Lódzkie, Poland as Daniel Marcel Olbrychski. He is an actor, known for Salt (2010), The Tin Drum (1979) and The Unbearable Lightness of Being (1988). He has been married to Krystyna Demska since October 23, 2003. He was previously married to Zuzanna Lapicka and Monika Dzienisiewicz-Olbrychska.
biography.name: Daniel Olbrychski

biography.bio: Natasza Urbanska was born on August 17, 1977 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland. She is an actress, known for La Bataille de Varsovie (2011), Fala zbrodni (2003) and Sztos (1997). She has been married to Janusz Józefowicz since August 16, 2008. They have one child.
biography.name: Natasza Urbanska

biography.bio: Borys Szyc was born on September 4, 1978 in Lódz, Lódzkie, Poland as Borys Michalak. He is an actor and producer, known for Recipe for Life (2011), Snow White and Russian Red (2009) and La dette (2011).
biography.name: Borys Szyc

biography.bio: Jerzy Bonczak was born on July 29, 1949 in Biezun, Mazowieckie, Poland. He is an actor, known for Tribulations d'une amoureuse sous Staline (2009), La Bataille de Varsovie (2011) and We're All Christs (2006).
biography.name: Jerzy Bonczak

biography.bio: Adam Ferency was born on October 5, 1951 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland. He is an actor, known for Niania (2005), L'interrogatoire (1982) and Pornography (2003).
biography.name: Adam Ferency

biography.bio: Boguslaw Linda was born on June 27, 1952 in Torun, Kujawsko-Pomorskie, Poland. He is an actor and director, known for Le hasard (1987), Pan Tadeusz - Quand Napoléon traversait le Niemen (1999) and Pigs (1992). He has been married to Lidia Popiel since July 23, 2000. They have one child.
biography.name: Boguslaw Linda

biography.bio: Ewa Wisniewska was born on April 25, 1942 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland. She is an actress, known for With Fire and Sword (1999), Cudzoziemka (1986) and Piata pora roku (2012).
biography.name: Ewa Wisniewska

biography.bio: Born on July 12th, 1963 in Moscow, Alexander Domogarov never dreamt of going on the stage despite having an actor father. He was going to be an engineer, but then he understood that it wasn't his calling. Alexander decided to go to a prestigious Schepkin Theater School, and managed to enter it at the first try. He made his stage debut in the Maly State Academic Theater, known for its traditions. Alexander has played a variety of theatrical roles, including Macbeth (Bagatela Theater, Poland), Vaslav Nijinsky in 'Nijinsky, God's Crazy Clown'(a play by an American playwright Glenn Blamstein), Cyrano de Bergerac, and others. He has starred in more than 20 films and TV series in Russia and Europe. In 1996, he landed the part of a noble, handsome Count Bussy D'Ambois in the popular Russian TV series, Grafinya de Monsoro (1998), based on a novel by Alexandre Dumas. The part brought him all-Russian fame. A historical epic, With Fire and Sword (1999) filmed by a cult Polish director Jerzy Hoffman where Alexander portrays a dashing Cossack chieftain Bohun, won him international acclaim. In 2000 Alexander was invited to play in a Swedish thriller The Diver (2000) where he acted opposite Klaus Maria Brandauer and 'Isabella Scorupco'. Among his recent movies is 'One June Night' (2001), made by another famous Polish director, Andrzej Wajda.
biography.name: Aleksandr Domogarov

biography.bio: Olga Kabo was born on January 28, 1968 as Olga Igorevna Kabo. She is an actress, known for Umirat ne strashno (1991), The Ice Runner (1992) and Priklyucheniya Kventina Dorvarda, strelka korolevskoy gvardii (1988). She has been married to Nikolai Razgulyayev since March 2009. They have one child. She was previously married to Eduard Vasilishen.
biography.name: Olga Kabo

biography.bio: Adam Strzelecki is known for his work on La Bataille de Varsovie (2011), Antygona (2011) and Dead Children (2012).
biography.name: Adam Strzelecki

biography.bio: Michal Zebrowski was born on June 17, 1972 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland. He is an actor, known for The Pianist (2002), The Welts (2004) and With Fire and Sword (1999). He has been married to Aleksandra Adamczyk since June 20, 2009.
biography.name: Michal Zebrowski

biography.bio: Rafal Cieszynski was born on June 10, 1976 in Rypin, Kujawsko-Pomorskie, Poland. He is an actor, known for Ojciec Mateusz (2008), With Fire and Sword (1999) and Inferno (2001).
biography.name: Rafal Cieszynski

biography.bio: Lukasz Garlicki was born on August 5, 1977 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland. He is an actor, known for Warsaw (2003), Syzyfowe prace (2000) and Mr. Kuka's Advice (2008).
biography.name: Lukasz Garlicki

biography.bio: Piotr Glowacki was born on March 29, 1980 in Torun, Kujawsko-Pomorskie, Poland. He is known for his work on Gods (2014), The Girl from the Wardrobe (2012) and Sous la ville (2011).
biography.name: Piotr Glowacki

biography.bio: Wojciech Solarz was born on April 13, 1979 in Michalin, Mazowieckie, Poland. He is an actor and writer, known for Gods (2014), 80 Millions (2011) and U Pana Boga w ogródku (2007).
biography.name: Wojciech Solarz

filmingLocations.location: New Town Market Square, New Town, Sródmiescie, Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland
